author: Nigel Slater
method: Blend all ingredients except for the cider in a blender. Pour in the cider and blend again. Serve in a jug with a few extra frozen cranberries for decoration.
ingredients: 200g/7oz ice ,  400g/14oz frozen cranberries, plus extra for decoration,  2-4 knobs of preserved stem ginger (depending on how gingery you like it),  3 tbsp syrup from the stem ginger jar,  500ml/18fl oz cider
